javadoc: Listener interface for mouse pressed events in the field panel.

methods.name: buttonPressed
methods.comment: Called whenever the mouse button is pressed.

params.name: location
params.comment: the field location of the mouse pointer

params.name: field
params.comment: the Field object that was clicked on

params.name: ev
params.comment: the mouse event that generated this call.

name: FieldMouseListener
comment: Listener interface for mouse pressed events in the field panel.
